'''Windows 7''' (formerly [[List of Microsoft codenames|codenamed]] '''Blackcomb''' and '''Vienna''') will be the next release of [[Microsoft Windows]], an [[operating system]] produced by [[Microsoft]] for use on [[personal computers]], including home and business [[Desktop computer|desktops]], [[laptop]]s, [[Tablet PC]]s, [[netbook]]s<ref name="Windows7">{{cite web|url=http://eeepc.itrunsonlinux.com/the-news/1-latest-news/261-netbook-version-of-windows-7|title=Netbook version of Windows 7?}}</ref> and [[media center]] PCs.<ref>{{cite web
|url=http://www.news.com/2100-1016_3-6197943.html

|title=Cnet: Next version of Windows: Call it 7
